sections.about: A challenging career that will enable me to exhibit my professional competency to the zenith and will enable me to expose my talent to the maximum, to reach the heights of success. To liven the life of others through technology.

experience.projectDesc: Project: EBIS. EBIS is an Australian Government project, Enterprise Biometric Identification Services for Biometric Identification of Individuals. It comes under Stealth Identity product. The Application enrolls individuals based on the Face, Fingerprint and Fusion metrics, identifies and verifies the individuals, mainly for Border security.

Project: MPS. MPS is a UK Metro-police System Application developed in Angular 5 and Node JS with MSSQL. The Application gets the latest crime statistics and advice, helps the Police to record the activities taken to tackle crime and communicate within the Department. In this application we have implemented the features of crimes codes, location tracking, Chat module, Instant Message logic, Task creation.

experience.projectDesc: replaced Benedict Cumberbatch in the gothic horror film Crimson Peak, directed by Guillermo del Toro. The film started filming in Toronto in February 2014, and was released in October 2015. starred as Robert Laing in High-Rise (2015), based on J. G. Ballard's novel of the same name and directed by Ben Wheatley.
portrayal of Loki in the 2011 Marvel Studios film Thor.

While still doing student plays, began appearing on television, landing parts in Stephen Whittaker's adaptation of Nicholas Nickleby (2001) for ITV,[15] the BBC/HBO co-production Conspiracy (2001), and as Randolph Churchill, the son of Winston Churchill, in the BBC/HBO drama The Gathering Storm (2002).
